policy: GCP Kubernetes cluster istioConfig not enabled
rule: $.resource[*].google_container_cluster exists and ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config does not exist or $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].istio_config does not exist or $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].istio_config[*] is empty or ($.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].istio_config[*] is not empty and $.resource[*].google_container_cluster.*[*].*.addons_config[*].istio_config[*].disabled any equal true))
